Intelligent Grading Assistant 1.0 documentation
Intelligent Grading Assistant 1.0 documentation

keywords module¶

class keywords.KeyWords(filepath=None)¶

Bases: object

The KeyWords class is used to search a given essay with a list of keywords and record their occurrences. It can also be used to add/remove words from a keyword list.

Parameters

filepath (str) – An optional filepath to a .csv containing a list of keywords. Not providing a filepath means starting with an empty keyword list that can be filled in over time.

add_keyword(word)¶

Adds given word to the current keyword list and to the corresponding .csv file

Parameters

word (str) – This should be a single word to be added to the keywords

Returns

True if added successfully, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

get_keywords()¶
Returns

A list of all currently used keywords.

Return type

list of str

occurrence(text)¶

Counts the occurrences of each keyword in a given essay

Parameters

text (str) – This is the raw text that you want to check.

Returns

This is a list of pairs, where each pair consists of the keyword followed by the number of occurrences of it in the text.

Return type

list

remove_keyword(word)¶

Removes given word from the current keyword list and the corresponding .csv file. If the word doesn’t exist in the keyword list, then simply return True.

Parameters

word (str) – This should be a single word to be removed from the keywords

Returns

True if removed successfully, False otherwise.

Return type

bool
